Package com.mwdiamond.fansi

F-Ansi, a Java terminal output library provided as a fluent API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnsiFactory
    A factory for providing Ansi instances in a dependency-injection friendly manor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ansi
    The Ansi class wraps an application's stdout and stderr to provide additional console functionality via ANSI escape codes, such as colored output and cursor repositioning.
    AnsiForTests
    Mechanism for writing ANSI codes to strings for testing, rather than stdout and stderr.
    AnsiUtils
    High-level utility class for common tasks involving ANSI output.
    AnsiUtils.ProgressBar
    A text progress bar that will overwrite itself when updated, presenting the user with dynamic yet concise visualization of the application's current progress.
    AnsiUtils.ProgressBar.Builder
    Builder for custom AnsiUtils.ProgressBar instances.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Ansi.Color
    Colors defined by the ANSI standard.
    Ansi.Font
    Fonts defined by the ANSI standard.
    Ansi.Style
    Styles defined by the ANSI standard.

Package com.mwdiamond.fansi Description

F-Ansi, a Java terminal output library provided as a fluent API.

The main entry-point class is Ansi. Higher-level utilities can be found in AnsiUtils.

See the project page for more details.
